vsParam:
Hmm, Sterk?
What are you doing holding a toolbox?

Ah, you guys.
I am going to repair the rooftop of the school building.
W, why would you repair the rooftop?

You have mended the wall earlier, right? Our senior Hazel
spoke very highly of your work, and said it's like a new wall.

Maybe that's the reason, she liked my craftsmanship,
and started to arrange me some repair works lately.

I repainted the wall yesterday,
and she asked me to repair the classroom doors.

Wow. Hazel is not so
polite even for a knight...
You should learn to say no!
Uh, what exactly does a knight do...

But someone must do these things.
I am just doing what I am capable of.

Huh, that's my sore spot...
Anyway, I am just taking jobs I am capable of...

In Arland, a knight's job mainly includes repairing
facilities and doing clerical works...

Uh, you have to do clerical works with such
superb swordsmanship, huh!?

Hmm. We also need to remove the weeds.
Basically most of these chores are done by knights.

N, no wonder you are so... good at it... Besides repairing
the walls, you have to remove the weeds, oh...

Before I became a knight, I never imagined
that I'd be doing all those things...

I gotta go. Let me know if you
need something repaired.

Ah, uh, got it!
Be careful when you work, Sterk!

Hmm... In our minds, knights are
all very handsome, but...

Maybe knights in Bressisle are
also doing these unimpressive jobs...

Seemingly glamorous title hides unknown efforts by the knights, huh? Perhaps the guards' job is more than
protecting safety here.

Should I also master skills such as
repairing the walls and rooftops...
